steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to apply text effects to.
Go to the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Font' group, click on the 'Text Effects' button.
A drop-down menu will appear. Choose the desired text effect from the available options.
The selected text will now have the applied text effect.
Save the changes to the document.
